job_name: Đà Nẵng_Nhân viên Tư vấn Kinh doanh
company_name: Công Ty Tài Chính TNHH Một Thành Viên Quốc Tế Việt Nam JACCS
job_details:
Mô tả Công việc
- Tư vấn cho khách hàng hiểu và sử dụng dịch vụ hỗ trợ cho vay và mua xe gắn máy/ các sản phẩm điện máy trả góp của Công ty.
- Thực hiện làm hồ sơ cho khách hàng vay và gởi hồ sơ cho bộ phận tín dụng.
- Hướng dẫn khách hàng ký hợp đồng và nhận xe/ các sản phẩm điện máy tại cửa hàng khi hồ sơ vay được duyệt.
- Thu thập các thông tin thị trường, đối thủ cạnh tranh, ý kiến của khách hàng và đại lý đối tác.
- Thu thập và phản hồi các yêu cầu của Đại lý đối tác về phòng Kinh doanh.
- Thực hiện báo cáo theo quy định
* Làm việc tại các cửa hàng xe gắn máy/ các sản phẩm điện máy khu vực thành phố Đà Nẵng
job_required:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
Kinh nghiệm/Kỹ năng chi tiết
- Độ tuổi: 18 - 30
- Trình độ THPT trở lên, Biết sử dụng Word, Excel.
- Độc lập, tự tin, tươi vui, hoạt bát, nhanh nhẹn; có trách nhiệm, tinh thần hoạt động đội nhóm tốt.
- Không nhận ứng viên có kinh nghiệm Tư vấn/ bán hàng tại ngân hàng hoặc các công ty tài chính.
- Ứng viên không có kinh nghiệm sẽ được đào tạo.

company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH SẢN XUẤT VÀ THƯƠNG MẠI UNITED VISION
job_details:
Mô tả Công việc
Day to day management of a strong supportive client starting from Binh Thuan City and ending in Thanh Hoa Province
Assisting in hiring new sales employees and offering them training sessions, building up the team.
Preparing overall business plan as well as setting sales goals reasonably for each team member.
Regularly reviewing the sales data and creating the reports to the Sales Director.
Organizing sales meetings every morning to analyze sales insights & daily activities.
Leading a team of sales personnel, assigning them tasks and keeping track of them.
Working with company Chef Team to conduct training, achieve the newest product information, plan for the demo class (public or accounts) with clients including Demo Chef recommendation.
Ensuring that sales staffs are appropriately trained and competent to perform their job duties.
Attending to all the training provided by marketing or manufacture (distribution brands).
Providing ongoing training, motivation, and development of sales associates to ensure that sales and profits are effectively managed and maintained.
Schedule to visit clients with Sales Team Numbers or Technician Team and provide the maintaining service to clients.
Offering detailed product information to the clients, answering all the questions of the clients related to the product and/or services.
Identifying and acquiring new customers, as well as up-selling to the existing customer base.
Building brand awareness in the assigned geographical area.
Joining the Chef Associations and keeping a close distance, may discuss with marketing to use our demo rooms for some of the co-branding activities, chef’s demo or food & pastry competitions.
Maintaining a strong relationship with current and prospective clients, key accounts.
Developing the sub-distribution channels and keeping the good communications, “Sub-dealers are our partners, not competitors”.
Following up with the potential clients by visiting them along with the Sales Team.
Maintaining a positive working environment, collaboration with the Sales Team Members.
Coordinating with other teams to ensure smooth delivery of products & services.
Making sure the team members are achieving the sales targets.
Willingness to travel regularly, host the meetings, attend to trade show (Exhibition) and assist with general management duties.
Analyzing market trends and competitors’ activities and formulating strategies to respond to these.
Finding ways to enhance sales performance metrics and KPIs.
job_required:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
Personal Competencies
Required
Graduated from college/college/university majoring in Business Administration and Economics
At least 3 years of experience in a management position
Sales experience and with a "roll up the sleeves" attitude.
Working knowledge of the Food Service industry (food manufacturer, food distributor,  equipment specialist, chef) ideally, with a proven successful experience to develop a  distribution network.
High drive and energy, combined with charismatic personality able to motivate and  enthuse.
Sales or culinary experience within the Foodservice sector
Ability to form strong, professional relationships with our distributor network
Demonstrated track record of achieving sales revenue targets
Ability to work within a solid, supportive team environment adhering to company  values
Attention to detail and able to complete and submit reports in a timely manner
Highly organised with good attention to detail
Focused on providing industry leading service and support for your customer base
Self-motivated with the ability to plan effectively and work autonomously
Strong, energetic personality with a high level of integrity
Able to work independently within a framework of team goals and company value
Address to working
:
452 Nguyen Huu Tho, Trung Khe Ward, Cam Le District. Da Nang City, Viet Nam
Skills
Organisational skills
Interpersonal skills
Ability to work under pressure
Flexibility
Ability to follow process
Attention to detail
Proficiency in English
Appraisal:
Appraisal performed at 2 months, from commencement of position, and then  annually; or when there is a change of position, or any time there is a need to review performance
